description: Orbsurv Patrol Module turns static camera coverage into adaptive perimeter intelligence. The linear-drive carriage rides a carbon fiber rail, settling into any position along the path without disturbing your workflow.

Dual edge processors fuse thermal, RGB, and motion sensors in real time, while encrypted backhaul syncs only prioritized events to your command center. Operators can assume manual control with a joystick or schedule autonomous sweeps that react to threat levels.
specs: Modular 10 m sections up to 50 m per run
120° gimballed camera sweep with 6x optical zoom
4K RGB, thermal, mm-wave motion, ambient light
NVIDIA Jetson Orin NX with Orbsurv VisionOS
Wi-Fi 6E, LTE private, or fiber backhaul
Dual-fed AC w/ battery bridge or 48V DC bus
